item.description:
This April 4th, 2012 meeting topic is:


Sharpening Your Numbers:

Rehab Estimate & Analysis

 

Rehabbers...Make accurate offers with confidence!

Wholesalers... Get your deals sold without having to go back to your sellers!

 Property Owners... Protect your cashflow!

 Whether you are a rehabber, wholesaler, or property owner, the repair estimate can make or break your deal. Performing due diligence and finding accurate rehab costs are vital to your analysis process.

 

In this seminar, Nick will teach you how to properly estimate rehabs:

  • Pre-inspection numbers: Quick analysis for a quick offer
  • All the due-diligence leading up to the closing: What to look for at town hall
  • Rehab confirmation walk-through: Why it's necessary
  • Things to look out for: How to spot problems with systems, foundation, and more

Know what kind of property you are getting into BEFORE you sign the dotted line... and more importantly, know how much to pay for it!

 

ABOUT THE SPEAKER:

Nick Aalerud has completed over 100 deals. He specializes in rehabbing, short sale negotiations, wholesaling, and buy & hold.

Nick Aalerud started his investing career as a banker for BNY Mellon Financial.  Dealing with mutual funds, stocks and bonds, here is where he learned the many advantages real estate investing has over the traditional financial markets.

He then created AA Real Estate Enterprises as its own real estate acquisition firm in 2005.  Over the past several years, the company has grown from investing in single family homes in Massachusetts, to both residential & commercial transactions throughout the United States, providing substantial returns for its investors.

The company continues to locate target areas and implement strategies, providing excellent returns his investors have come to expect.

Nick Aalerud frequently speaks throughout the New England area, educating people about the benefits of real estate investing and its many strategies.  Since 2009, he has spoken at over 20 seminars, workshops, and expos. 

What people are saying about the seminars...

"Nick did a great job-His passion & enthusiasm is infectious!" -T.B.

"You helped me refocus on getting it done... Thank you for the shot in the arm I needed." - J.S.         About AA Real Estate Group:

 AA Real Estate Partners is a professional real estate acquisition company that serves to create opportunities for our investors.   This is done through buying, selling, and managing single-family and multi-family homes.

AA Real Estate Enterprises, LLC was established by Nick Aalerud, our Managing Member, in 2005.   Shortly after, he created AA Real Estate Partners as a division within this entity to serve our investors.

Within the past 7 years, AA Real Estate's experience has spanned millions of dollars in closed transactions. As of last summer, we completed our 100th redevelopment deal.  We continue to grow each year as well as additions to The AA Real Estate Group.

 


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.
